thread.title: Watch: Dude Performs Led Zeppelin's 'Black Dog' In Guitar, Drums & Vocals At The Same Time [News]
thread.title_full: Watch: Dude Performs Led Zeppelin's 'Black Dog' In Guitar, Drums & Vocals At The Same Time [News]

title: Watch: Dude Performs Led Zeppelin's 'Black Dog' In Guitar, Drums & Vocals At The Same Time [News]
text: I'm assuming this guy got annoyed with his old band mates hogging all the booze, women & cocaine so he learnt everything himself to collect all the spoils 0 Cool, now stop wasting your time and seeking attention, and go and write your own shit K? K... 7 Oh shit, this must be worst comment od 2017, even though it's just february 3 He does write his own shit .. You'd know that if you spent 10 seconds looking into things before posting stupid comments. 0 Oyface 145 · 6 hours ago · permalink · ↑ reply Of course he does, but I think you misinterpreted what I said. My point was that this kind of attention-seeking, novelty cover attitude that a lot of people have is just silly and a waste of time. I'd rather just hear this guy's own stuff rather than trying to take credit for someone else's work by doing a rather juvenile-styled cover. It's insulting to an audience and to himself. Thanks. 8 I think trying to be an edgy attention seeker in the UG comments is worse than making an attention seeking youtube video but that's just me. 6 and here i am can't even work a wah pedal while playing! 0 This guy is seriously talented and his voice is phenomenal. 0 i cant masturbate while playing guitar 0
